kv17.10:1.4_0: Nanu bhagavā dvipadānaṁ aggo, dvipadānaṁ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṁ pamokkho, dvipadānaṁ uttamo,
kv17.10:1.4_1: dvipadānaṁ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti?
kv17.10:1.6_0: Hañci bhagavā dvipadānaṁ aggo, dvipadānaṁ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṁ pamokkho, dvipadānaṁ uttamo,
kv17.10:1.6_1: dvipadānaṁ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:2.8_0: sīlena samādhinā paññāya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv17.10:4.2_0: Buddhena seṭṭho ca samo ca vijjati;
kv17.10:5.4_0: Na vattabbaṁ buddhassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā niṭṭhitā.
